Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

Contact Cher plus 59,000+ celebrities, influencers, and public figures using our online database.

How is Cher connected to Donald Trump?

Cher is connected to Donald Trump primarily through her outspoken criticism of him. She has frequently used her platform to voice her opposition to Trump‚Äôs policies and actions. For instance, Cher threatened to leave the country if Trump were re-elected in 2024.

How is Cher connected to Jennifer Aniston?

Cher and Jennifer Aniston share a long-standing friendship that dates back to the late 1970s. Aniston, who attended high school with Cher‚Äôs son Chaz Bono, often visited Cher‚Äôs home as a teenager. They enjoyed meals and snacks together during these visits, creating fond memories.

How is Cher connected to Joe Biden?

Cher is a vocal supporter of Joe Biden. During the 2020 presidential campaign, she actively campaigned for him, including performing at virtual events and using her social media presence to endorse his candidacy and encourage people to vote for him.

How is Cher connected to Kamala Harris?

Cher has supported Kamala Harris, particularly during the 2020 presidential campaign when Harris was Joe Biden‚Äôs vice presidential running mate. Cher has praised Harris for her qualifications and historic candidacy, often highlighting her achievements and encouraging voters to support the Biden-Harris ticket.

How is Cher connected to Kelly Clarkson?

Cher and Kelly Clarkson are connected through an appearance on ‚ÄúThe Kelly Clarkson Show.‚Äù During her visit to the show, Cher reminisced about Jennifer Aniston frequently visiting her home as a teenager in the 1970s. Cher fondly recalled how Aniston and her friends would enjoy meals together, highlighting their long-standing friendship and their fun times, which Clarkson.

How is Cher connected to Meryl Street?

Cher and Meryl Streep are connected through their work on ‚ÄúMamma Mia! Here We Go Again‚Äù (2018). In this movie, Meryl Streep reprised her role as Donna Sheridan, while Cher played the role of Ruby Sheridan, Donna‚Äôs mother.

How is Cher connected to Taylor Swift?

Cher and Taylor Swift are connected through their influence and impact on the music industry. Both artists are known for their strong, independent personas and have been vocal about their views on social and political issues. Taylor Swift has often cited Cher as an inspiration for her ability to reinvent herself and maintain relevance over decades in the entertainment business.
